alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 03 at 7:35AM EST until March 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following county, Fleming. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers will continue before a cold front approaches and brings a thunderstorms to the area this afternoon. Rainfall totals of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected with locally higher amounts possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
